articles.description: Tech companies have been in culling mode off late. The likes of Amazon, Meta, Intel, Cisco, Twitter all have announced job cuts that have resulted in thousands losing their employment across the world. Various reasons are being cited for the layoffs that have…
articles.content: Hard drive maker Seagate Technology announced last month that it plans to cut 8% of its global workforce, or about 3,000 employees, citing economic uncertainty and declining demand for its parts. Cus… [+283 chars]
